statements: SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost FROM assets WHERE useful_life > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE depreciation_method = 'Straight-Line' AND purchase_cost <= 5000;
SELECT asset_name, depreciation_method FROM assets WHERE useful_life < 10 ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_cost) AS average_cost, MAX(useful_life) AS max_life FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost FROM assets WHERE purchase_cost > 1000 ORDER BY asset_name DESC
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE useful_life > 5 AND depreciation_method = 'Straight Line' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost, useful_life FROM assets WHERE purchase_cost < 5000 AND depreciation_method = 'Double Declining Balance'
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date FROM assets WHERE useful_life BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_cost FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life > 5;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date FROM fixed_assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT expense_id, asset_id, depreciation_amount, period FROM depreciation_expenses WHERE depreciation_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM depreciation_expenses WHERE period BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, depreciation_amount FROM fixed_assets JOIN depreciation_expenses ON fixed_assets.asset_id = depreciation_expenses.asset_id WHERE depreciation_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_cost BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY asset_name

SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, depreciation_amount FROM fixed_assets JOIN depreciation_expenses ON fixed_assets.asset_id = depreciation_expenses.asset_id WHERE period >= '2022-01-01' AND period <= '2022-12-31'

SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost, depreciation_amount FROM fixed_assets JOIN depreciation_expenses ON fixed_assets.asset_id = depreciation_expenses.asset_id WHERE purchase_cost > 10000 AND useful_life > 7 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life > 5;
SELECT asset_id AS ID, asset_name AS Name FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_price < 5000;
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT asset_name, useful_life FROM fixed_assets ORDER BY useful_life DESC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, useful_life ASC
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life > 5 AND asset_name LIKE 'Computer%'
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price, useful_life FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_price FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life < 3 AND purchase_price < 5000 ORDER BY useful_life DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assets, AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_price FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life >= 4
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost FROM fixed_assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost, purchase_date FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_cost > 1000;
SELECT method_name, useful_life FROM depreciation_methods;
SELECT asset_id, depreciation_expense FROM depreciation_expenses WHERE depreciation_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, purchase_cost FROM fixed_assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_cost > 5000;
SELECT asset_name, method_name, useful_life, depreciation_rate FROM fixed_assets JOIN depreciation_methods ON fixed_assets.asset_id = depreciation_methods.method_id;

SELECT asset_name, depreciation_expense, depreciation_date FROM fixed_assets JOIN depreciation_expenses ON fixed_assets.asset_id = depreciation_expenses.asset_id WHERE depreciation_expense > 1000 ORDER BY depreciation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fixed_assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life > 5;
SELECT asset_id, purchase_date FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT method_name, depreciation_rate FROM depreciation_methods;
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount FROM depreciation_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life > 5 ORDER BY purchase_price DESC;
SELECT method_name, depreciation_rate FROM depreciation_methods WHERE depreciation_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM depreciation_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 5000 AND expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM fixed_assets JOIN depreciation_summary ON fixed_assets.asset_id = depreciation_summary.asset_id WHERE total_expense_amount < total_calculated_amount;
SELECT asset_id, calculated_amount FROM depreciation_logs WHERE calculated_date = '2022-06-30';
